alerts.message: Despite an approved pre-authorization (PA-2024-00231) for ₹500,000.00, the insurance company has covered ₹0.00 of the ₹400,000.00 hospital bill. This indicates a significant issue with claim processing or coverage application, leaving the patient with a substantial balance.
alerts.suggested_action: Immediately contact Red INsurance to clarify why the approved pre-authorization is not being honored and why no amount has been covered. Review the claim submission details against the pre-authorization conditions and approved procedures to identify any discrepancies or unmet requirements.
